data.name: Police Report
data.summary: The Police Report IEPD was developed for the California Department of Justice - Data Exchange Project.
data.description: A Police Report is sent to several recipients dependant upon the circumstance under which the Police Report is generated.  A full description is provided in the IEPD Documentation file.  Possible recipients of the Police Report are the Department of Justice, Prosecutor, and the California Department of Corrections and Rehabilitation.  The Police Report contains party, subject, and vicitim information, as well as incident descriptors.  The Police Report is one of 44 IEPDs developed by the California Department of Justice - Data Exchange Project to support information exchange between state and local government organizations throughout the state of California.  It could also be adapted for use in other states.
data.source:
